text: When you block someone on Snapchat,

they will no longer be
able to send you snaps
or see any of your public posts.

Blocking someone will also
unfriend them on Snapchat.
To block someone, go to their profile.

You can do this by
clicking on their Bitmoji.

Tap on the three dots on the
upper right of the screen.
Tap "Manage Friendship."
Continue by tapping "Block."
It will ask for a confirmation.
Tap "Block" to proceed.
To unblock someone,

go to your profile by
tapping on your Bitmoji.

Tap on the gear icon to
navigate to your settings.
Scroll to the bottom of the page.
Tap on "Blocked."

Here, you'll see a list of
the users that you've blocked.

Tap on the X by the person
that you'd like to unblock.
Finally, it'll ask you to confirm whether
or not you want to unblock this user.
